section.para: getbkdapi - generates the API of an Epeios backend in XML format.

getbkdapi connects to a backend and queries it about the object it object types it handles and their methods. The API is generated in XML format. backend is the location of the backend (in localhost:1234 format), and file is the file name in which the resulting XML document is written. If no file given, the XML document is written to the standard output.

tmcdecgi returns following values upon completion :
0 : completed successfully.
other value : an error occurs.

chapter.title: Author
chapter.para: tmcdecgi was developed by Claude SIMON.
